creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: drawing has been cut in a roundel shape, mounted on an eighteenth century square sheet with egg and dart surround and corner shell cartouches; image of a seated woman with an infant on her PL thigh; two angels hold a crown over her head and small putti recline around her
inscription:
on lower mount: Salimbene Ventura
on verso of mount: Fran.co Vanni
markings: on verso of mount: embossed collector\'s stamp (tupil with a leaf?)
medium: Pen, ink and brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
title: Madonna and Child with Angels
